blocks.name: cdit
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the directed integral.
blocks.origin: prop class cdit(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) { S_[c0 → c1](c2, s0) }

blocks.name: diff.cdit.s
blocks.origin:
axiom diff.cdit.s(setvar sBase, setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- diffsc(sBase, cdit(s0, c0, c1, c2))
  -| diffss(sBase, s0)
  -| diffsc(sBase, c0)
  -| diffsc(sBase, c1)
  -| diffsc(sBase, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom diff.cdit.s(setvar sBase, setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ d(sBase, S_[c0 → c1](c2, s0))
  ⊣ d(sBase, s0)
  ⊣ d(sBase, c0)
  ⊣ d(sBase, c1)
  ⊣ d(sBase, c2)
}

blocks.name: diff.cdit.c
blocks.origin:
axiom diff.cdit.c(class cBase, setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- diffcc(cBase, cdit(s0, c0, c1, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, cBase)
  -| diffcc(cBase, c0)
  -| diffcc(cBase, c1)
  -| diffcc(cBase, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom diff.cdit.c(class cBase, setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ d(cBase, S_[c0 → c1](c2, s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, cBase)
  ⊣ d(cBase, c0)
  ⊣ d(cBase, c1)
  ⊣ d(cBase, c2)
}

blocks.name: diff.cdit.w
blocks.origin:
axiom diff.cdit.w(wff wBase, setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- diffcw(cdit(s0, c0, c1, c2), wBase)
  -| diffsw(s0, wBase)
  -| diffcw(c0, wBase)
  -| diffcw(c1, wBase)
  -| diffcw(c2, wBase)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom diff.cdit.w(wff wBase, setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ d(S_[c0 → c1](c2, s0), wBase)
  ⊣ d(s0, wBase)
  ⊣ d(c0, wBase)
  ⊣ d(c1, wBase)
  ⊣ d(c2, wBase)

blocks.name: df-ditg
blocks.content: Define the directed integral, which is just a regular integral but with a sign change when the limits are interchanged. The ` A ` and ` B ` here are the lower and upper limits of the integral, usually written as a subscript and superscript next to the integral sign. We define the region of integration to be an open interval instead of closed so that we can use ` +oo , -oo ` for limits and also integrate up to a singularity at an endpoint. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2014.)

blocks.name: ditgeq1
blocks.content: Equality theorem for the directed integral. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ditgeq1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cdit(s0, c0, c2, c3), cdit(s0, c1, c2, c3)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cdit(s0, c0, c2, c3), cdit(s0, c1, c2, c3), cif(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c2), c3), cneg(citg(s0, co(c2, cioo, c0), c3)), wbr(c0, cle, c2)), cif(citg(s0, co(c1, cioo, c2), c3), cneg(citg(s0, co(c2, cioo, c1), c3)), wbr(c1, cle, c2)), wceq(c0, c1))
  ifbieq12d(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c2), c3), cneg(citg(s0, co(c2, cioo, c0), c3)), citg(s0, co(c1, cioo, c2), c3), cneg(citg(s0, co(c2, cioo, c1), c3)), wceq(c0, c1), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c1, cle, c2))
  breq1(c0, c1, cle, c2)
  syl(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c2), c3), citg(s0, co(c1, cioo, c2), c3)), wceq(co(c0, cioo, c2), co(c1, cioo, c2)))
  oveq1(c0, c1, cioo, c2)
  itgeq1(s0, co(c0, cioo, c2), co(c1, cioo, c2), c3)
  negeqd(citg(s0, co(c2, cioo, c0), c3), citg(s0, co(c2, cioo, c1), c3), wceq(c0, c1))
  syl(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(citg(s0, co(c2, cioo, c0), c3), citg(s0, co(c2, cioo, c1), c3)), wceq(co(c2, cioo, c0), co(c2, cioo, c1)))
  oveq2(c0, c1, c2, cioo)
  itgeq1(s0, co(c2, cioo, c0), co(c2, cioo, c1), c3)
  df-ditg(s0, c0, c2, c3)
  df-ditg(s0, c1, c2, c3)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cioo, c2)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, cioo, c2)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, cioo, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, cioo, c1)
  diff.cioo.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: ditgeq2
blocks.content: Equality theorem for the directed integral. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ditgeq2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cdit(s0, c2, c0, c3), cdit(s0, c2, c1, c3)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cdit(s0, c2, c0, c3), cdit(s0, c2, c1, c3), cif(citg(s0, co(c2, cioo, c0), c3), cneg(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c2), c3)), wbr(c2, cle, c0)), cif(citg(s0, co(c2, cioo, c1), c3), cneg(citg(s0, co(c1, cioo, c2), c3)), wbr(c2, cle, c1)), wceq(c0, c1))
  ifbieq12d(citg(s0, co(c2, cioo, c0), c3), cneg(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c2), c3)), citg(s0, co(c2, cioo, c1), c3), cneg(citg(s0, co(c1, cioo, c2), c3)), wceq(c0, c1), wbr(c2, cle, c0), wbr(c2, cle, c1))
  breq2(c0, c1, c2, cle)
  syl(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(citg(s0, co(c2, cioo, c0), c3), citg(s0, co(c2, cioo, c1), c3)), wceq(co(c2, cioo, c0), co(c2, cioo, c1)))
  oveq2(c0, c1, c2, cioo)
  itgeq1(s0, co(c2, cioo, c0), co(c2, cioo, c1), c3)
  negeqd(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c2), c3), citg(s0, co(c1, cioo, c2), c3), wceq(c0, c1))
  syl(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c2), c3), citg(s0, co(c1, cioo, c2), c3)), wceq(co(c0, cioo, c2), co(c1, cioo, c2)))
  oveq1(c0, c1, cioo, c2)
  itgeq1(s0, co(c0, cioo, c2), co(c1, cioo, c2), c3)
  df-ditg(s0, c2, c0, c3)
  df-ditg(s0, c2, c1, c3)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, cioo, c0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, cioo, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cioo, c2)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, cioo, c2)
  diff.cioo.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: ditgeq3
blocks.content: Equality theorem for the directed integral. (The domain of the equality here is very rough; for more precise bounds one should decompose it with ~ ditgpos first and use the equality theorems for ~ df-itg .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ditgeq3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wral(s0, cr, wceq(c0, c1)), wceq(cdit(s0, c2, c3, c0), cdit(s0, c2, c3, c1)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cdit(s0, c2, c3, c0), cdit(s0, c2, c3, c1), cif(citg(s0, co(c2, cioo, c3), c0), cneg(citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c2), c0)), wbr(c2, cle, c3)), cif(citg(s0, co(c2, cioo, c3), c1), cneg(citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c2), c1)), wbr(c2, cle, c3)), wral(s0, cr, wceq(c0, c1)))
  ifeq12d(citg(s0, co(c2, cioo, c3), c0), cneg(citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c2), c0)), citg(s0, co(c2, cioo, c3), c1), cneg(citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c2), c1)), wral(s0, cr, wceq(c0, c1)), wbr(c2, cle, c3))
  syl(wral(s0, cr, wceq(c0, c1)), wceq(citg(s0, co(c2, cioo, c3), c0), citg(s0, co(c2, cioo, c3), c1)), wral(s0, co(c2, cioo, c3), wceq(c0, c1)))
  ax-mp(wi(wral(s0, cr, wceq(c0, c1)), wral(s0, co(c2, cioo, c3), wceq(c0, c1))), wss(co(c2, cioo, c3), cr))
  ioossre(c2, c3)
  ssralv(s0, co(c2, cioo, c3), cr, wceq(c0, c1))
  itgeq2(s0, co(c2, cioo, c3), c0, c1)
  negeqd(citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c2), c0), citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c2), c1), wral(s0, cr, wceq(c0, c1)))
  syl(wral(s0, cr, wceq(c0, c1)), wceq(citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c2), c0), citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c2), c1)), wral(s0, co(c3, cioo, c2), wceq(c0, c1)))
  ax-mp(wi(wral(s0, cr, wceq(c0, c1)), wral(s0, co(c3, cioo, c2), wceq(c0, c1))), wss(co(c3, cioo, c2), cr))
  ioossre(c3, c2)
  ssralv(s0, co(c3, cioo, c2), cr, wceq(c0, c1))
  itgeq2(s0, co(c3, cioo, c2), c0, c1)
  df-ditg(s0, c2, c3, c0)
  df-ditg(s0, c2, c3, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, cioo, c3)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c3, cioo, c2)
  diff.cioo.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: ditg0
blocks.content: Value of the directed integral from a point to itself. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ditg0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cdit(s0, c0, c0, c1), nat0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  eqtri(cdit(s0, c0, c0, c1), nat0, cif(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c0), c1), cneg(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c0), c1)), wbr(c0, cle, c0)))
  df-ditg(s0, c0, c0, c1)
  eqtri(cif(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c0), c1), cneg(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c0), c1)), wbr(c0, cle, c0)), nat0, cif(nat0, nat0, wbr(c0, cle, c0)))
  mp2an(wceq(cif(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c0), c1), cneg(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c0), c1)), wbr(c0, cle, c0)), cif(nat0, nat0, wbr(c0, cle, c0))), wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c0), c1), nat0), wceq(cneg(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c0), c1)), nat0))
  eqtri(cneg(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c0), c1)), nat0, cneg(nat0))
  negeqi(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c0), c1), nat0)
  eqtri(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c0), c1), nat0, citg(s0, emptycls, c1))
  ax-mp(wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c0), c1), citg(s0, emptycls, c1)), wceq(co(c0, cioo, c0), emptycls))
  iooid(c0)
  itgeq1(s0, co(c0, cioo, c0), emptycls, c1)
  itg0(s0, c1)
  neg0()
  ifeq12(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c0), c1), nat0, cneg(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c0), c1)), nat0, wbr(c0, cle, c0))
  ifid(nat0, wbr(c0, cle, c0))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cioo, c0)
  diff.cioo.s(s0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: cbvditg
blocks.content: Change bound variable in a directed integral. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvditg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(cdit(s0, c0, c1, c2), cdit(s1, c0, c1, c3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| wnfc(s1, c2)
  -| wnfc(s0, c3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(cdit(s0, c0, c1, c2), cdit(s1, c0, c1, c3), cif(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), cneg(citg(s0, co(c1, cioo, c0), c2)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cif(citg(s1, co(c0, cioo, c1), c3), cneg(citg(s1, co(c1, cioo, c0), c3)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  ifbieq12i(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), cneg(citg(s0, co(c1, cioo, c0), c2)), citg(s1, co(c0, cioo, c1), c3), cneg(citg(s1, co(c1, cioo, c0), c3)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  biid(wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  cbvitg(s0, s1, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2, c3)
  negeqi(citg(s0, co(c1, cioo, c0), c2), citg(s1, co(c1, cioo, c0), c3))
  cbvitg(s0, s1, co(c1, cioo, c0), c2, c3)
  df-ditg(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  df-ditg(s1, c0, c1, c3)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cioo, c1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cioo, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, cioo, c0)
  diff.cioo.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c1, cioo, c0)
  diff.cioo.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cbvditg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ S_[c0 → c1](c2, s0)= S_[c0 → c1](c3, s1)
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 → c2 = c3)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c2)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(S_[c0 → c1](c2, s0), S_[c0 → c1](c3, s1), if(c0[≤]c1, S.((c0[(,)]c1), c2, s0), -u(S.((c1[(,)]c0), c2, s0))), if(c0[≤]c1, S.((c0[(,)]c1), c3, s1), -u(S.((c1[(,)]c0), c3, s1))))
  ifbieq12i(S.((c0[(,)]c1), c2, s0), -u(S.((c1[(,)]c0), c2, s0)), S.((c0[(,)]c1), c3, s1), -u(S.((c1[(,)]c0), c3, s1)), c0[≤]c1, c0[≤]c1)
  biid(c0[≤]c1)
  cbvitg(s0, s1, (c0[(,)]c1), c2, c3)
  negeqi(S.((c1[(,)]c0), c2, s0), S.((c1[(,)]c0), c3, s1))
  cbvitg(s0, s1, (c1[(,)]c0), c2, c3)
  df-ditg(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  df-ditg(s1, c0, c1, c3)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cioo, c1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cioo, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, cioo, c0)
  diff.cioo.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c1, cioo, c0)
  diff.cioo.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: cbvditgv
blocks.content: Change bound variable in a directed integral. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvditgv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(cdit(s0, c0, c1, c2), cdit(s1, c0, c1, c3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  cbvditg(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  nfcv(s1, c2)
  nfcv(s0, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cbvditgv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ S_[c0 → c1](c2, s0)= S_[c0 → c1](c3, s1)
  ⊣ (s0 = s1 → c2 = c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  cbvditg(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  nfcv(s1, c2)
  nfcv(s0, c3)
}

blocks.name: ditgpos
blocks.content: Value of the directed integral in the forward direction. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ditgpos(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cdit(s0, c0, c1, c2), citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cdit(s0, c0, c1, c2), citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cdit(s0, c0, c1, c2), citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cdit(s0, c0, c1, c2), citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2))), diffsw(s0, w0))
  syl5eq(cdit(s0, c0, c1, c2), citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), cif(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), cneg(citg(s0, co(c1, cioo, c0), c2)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), w0)
  df-ditg(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  iftrued(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), cneg(citg(s0, co(c1, cioo, c0), c2)), w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1))
}

blocks.name: ditgneg
blocks.content: Value of the directed integral in the backward direction. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ditgneg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cdit(s0, c0, c1, c2), cneg(citg(s0, co(c1, cioo, c0), c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cle, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cdit(s0, c0, c1, c2), cneg(citg(s0, co(c1, cioo, c0), c2)))), diffsw(s0, w0))
  pm2.61d1(w0, wceq(cdit(s0, c0, c1, c2), cneg(citg(s0, co(c1, cioo, c0), c2))), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  syl6bi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1), wceq(cdit(s0, c0, c1, c2), cneg(citg(s0, co(c1, cioo, c0), c2))), wceq(c1, c0))
  bitr4d(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1), wceq(c1, c0), wa(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  biantrurd(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0))
  letri3d(c1, c0, w0)

blocks.name: ditgsplit
blocks.content: This theorem is the raison d'être for the directed integral, because unlike ~ itgspliticc , there is no constraint on the ordering of the points ` A , B , C ` in the domain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
